name.ja: <ruby>深<rt>しん</rt></ruby><ruby>淵<rt>えん</rt></ruby><ruby>海<rt>かい</rt></ruby><ruby>竜<rt>りゅう</rt></ruby>アビス・クラーケン［<ruby>Ｒ<rt>アール</rt></ruby>］

requirement.en: Send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.

effect.en: Change the battle position of 1 monster on your opponent's field. Also, if this card is in Maximum Mode, this card inflicts piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference), if it attacks a Defense Position monster this turn.
